text: Zoltan Balogh (born 3 August 1930) is a Romanian gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1952 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Romanian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Romania Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:People from Chișineu-Criș
title: Zoltan Balogh
